bibl.title: with contributions by Olaf E. KAPER, Helen WHITEHOUSE and Klaas A. WORP, Excavations at Mut el-Kharab and Ismant el-Kharab in 2001-2.
bibl.note: Dakhleh Oasis Project 2001/2002. - Mut el-Kharab. Excavations within the Area of the Temple of Seth. - Excavation in the South-East Corner of the Temenos. - Excavations in the Cemetery south of the Temple Enclosure. - The Excavations at Ismant el-Kharab. The Excavations and Study of the Pharaonic-style Plaster (O.E.K.). - The Study of the Classical Painted Plaster (H.W.). - A note on the [6] Inscribed Wooden Boards from Test 1 (K.A.W.). Identification of the Texts (verbs, calculations, part of a parody of Homer's Iliad).
